column5: http://zapatopi.net/afdb/  I will be busy with a construction project!
Thanks, Paul, a very timely reminder.  Don't forget that the shiny side MUST face outwards, otherwise you just look silly.
I have mine on the inside of my OFC ball cap I don't look silly that way
Have you been drinking Cleveland water
LOL Chief! In my younger days, now we get it from Avon Lake, upstream from Cleveland, downstream from Detroit!
